p: All of the inoculated plates were incubated at 35 °C. The incubation period lasted for about 18 h for those plates inoculated with the test bacterial strains and for about 48 h for those plates inoculated with Candida albicans. The lowest concentration of T. bovei essential oil, at which no visible microbial growth in that micro-well was observed, and was considered as the minimal inhibitory concentration (MIC) of the examined T. bovei essential oil.
